Lilian Sinclair Stevenson (Amụrụ n'ụbọchị 16 Nọvemba 1870), bụ onye Kraịst na-eme udo, onye na-ede akụkọ ihe mere eme na otu n'ime ndị guzobere International Fellowship of Reconciliation

A mụrụ Lilian Stevenson na Dublin, Ireland n'ụbọchị 16 Nọvemba 1870 nye Reverend William Fleming Stevenson, onye ụkọchukwu Presbyterian maka Christ Church na Rathgar na nwunye ya, Elzabeth Montgomery née Sinclair, ezinụlọ bara ọgaranya ma na-ekpe okpukpe. Onye Kraịst siri ike, ọ ghọrọ otu n'ime ndị isi nke Student Christian Movement nke Great Britain.
N'afọ 1914, o sonyere na nnọkọ na Cambridge nke malitere otu udo nke Ndị Kraịst na UK

N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, n'oge Krismas nke afọ 1914 ruo afọ 1915, otu a guzobere Fellowship of Reconciliation.
O sonyere na Nzukọ Bilthoven nke 1919, 1920 na 1921

Site na nzukọ afọ 1919 nke kpọkọtara ihe dị ka mmadụ iri ise, ihe o kwuru banyere ihe omume ahụ bụ: "Anyị zutere dị ka ndị ọ na-amaghị: anyị kewara Fellowship". N'ihi nzukọ ndị a, MTCI (Movement Towards a Christian International) ghọrọ International Fellowship of Reconciliation (IFOR)
Onye ọzọ sonyere na nke a bụ Pierre Cérésole onye sonyere na nzukọ ndị a wee kpebie ịmepụta Service Civil International naff 1920.
